member.name: P:Z0.Xed.ParsedXedInstructions.Count
member.summary: The number of instructions parsed from the source

member.name: F:Z0.XedSourceMarkers.InstructionSeq
member.summary: Whe encountered, signals a list of insruction specifications to follow, where each specification covers multiple lines of text, bounded above by a line containing a single left-brace and below by a line cotaining a single right-brace

member.name: F:Z0.XedSourceMarkers.FuncBodyBegin
member.summary: When encountered, signals a sequence of lines that describe an instruction

member.name: F:Z0.XedSourceMarkers.FuncBodyEnd
member.summary: When encountered, signals that a sequence of instruction description lines has concluded

member.name: T:Z0.XedInstructionDoc
member.summary: Defines a container over the data found in an instruction resource file for a single instruction
